channel.title: [1.5.2]dark moon [pvp] [mcmmo] [towny] [games] [parkour]
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/Segu3H2.gif[/img][/center] [center][size=36pt]IP: 209.222.2.221[/size][/center] Dark Moon is a new PvP based server. You earn points by killing people and winning parkour/games. They will give you points to which you level up with or purchase upgrades/items with. The survival world includes a nether and open world PvP. It uses towny and you can create a town or even a nation with friends and create many enemies! You start out with chain mail armor and basic tools and a iron sword. We have many parkour courses that range from short to long and easy to hard. We have 8 games that you can play that include
[ul][li]Paintball[/li] [li]Spleef[/li] [li]Capture The Flag[/li] [li]Arena[/li] [li]Skirmish[/li] [li]Battlegrounds[/li] [li]Coldsseum[/li] [li]FFA[/li] [li]Deathmatch[/li][/ul]
We also try to host bracketed tournaments every weekend! These give large rewards. Hope to see you on!
Additional Details
Dark Moon is a new PvP based server. You earn points by killing people and winning parkour/games. They will give you points to which you level up with or purchase upgrades/items with.
IMAGES: http://imgur.com/a/GLVup
